item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass is closed when this picture was taken.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395 North
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 North in Mono County. Turn left (across the divided highway) for US-395 south to Bishop; left for US-395 north to Lee Vining. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 junction. Turn right for US-395 North/CA-120 West. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West at US-395
item.description: CA-120 West at US-395 in Mono County. Turn left for US-395 south to Bishop; left for US-395 north/(CA-120 west) to Lee Vining. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: CA-120 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-120 west. Distance to Jct. US-395, Lee Vining, and Yosemite.

item.title: CA-120 West at Benton Crossing Road
item.description: CA-120 West at Benton Crossing Road in Mono County. Turn left for Benton Cross Road south to Crowley Lake and US-395; continue straight for CA-120 West to Tioga Pass and US-395.

item.title: CA-120 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-120 west. Distance to US-395, Lee Vining, and Yosemite. CA-120 is open to US-395. This stretch of CA-120 is closed during the winter months.

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: CA-120 West - Mono County
item.description: CA-120 west in Mono County. Mono Lake is in the background of the photo.

item.title: US-395 South - Sierra Pass Information
item.description: Sierra pass closure information on US-395 south. Information for Sonora Pass (CA-108) and Tioga Pass (CA-120). At the time this photo was taken both passes were open.

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 south to Bishop and Mammoth Lakes. Turn left for US-395 north to Lee Vining and Reno. Turn right to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: CA-120 East at US-395
item.description: CA-120 east at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Lee Vining; left for US-395 south to Bishop. Turn right on US-395 to continue east on CA-120.

item.title: CA-120 East - Mono County Line
item.description: Mono County Line on CA-120 east at Tioga Pass.

item.title: CA-120 East - Tioga Pass
item.description: First CA-120 shield after leaving Yosemite National Park at Tioga Pass.

item.title: CA-120 East - Priest Coulterville Road
item.description: CA-120 East at Priest Coulterville Road in Tuolumne County.

item.title: CA-120 East - Old Priest Grade Road
item.description: CA-120 East at Old Priest Grade Road. Continue east on CA-120 for Groveland and Yosemite.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-120 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-49 South/CA-120 East. Distance to Groveland, Coulterville, and Yosemite.

item.title: CA-120 East Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-120 East approaching CA-49 in Chinese Camp.

item.title: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120
item.description: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120 junction in Tuolumne County.

item.title: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120
item.description: CA-108/CA-120 East at CA-120 east to Groveland, Yosemite, and Chinese Camp. Continue east on CA-108 for Sonora.

item.title: CA-120 East at CA-108
item.description: CA-120 east at CA-108 in Oakdale. Turn right for CA-108 west to Modesto. Turn left for CA-108/CA-120 east to Sonora and Yosemite. CA-120 joins CA-108 eastbound to the Chinese Camp area.

item.title: CA-99 South - Exits 242 and 241
item.description: CA-99 south at Exit 242 - CA-120 East/Sonora/Yosemite Ave. Approaching Exit 241 - CA-120 West/San Francisco. Continue south on CA-99 for Fresno and Los Angeles. CA-120 joins CA-99 south briefly through Manteca.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-395 north approaching CA-120 east to Tioga Pass and Yosemite. Tioga Pass was opened the day after this picture was taken.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Jct. CA-120 in Lee Vining, Jct. CA-160 to Hawthorne, and Reno.

item.title: US-395 North At CA-120 East
item.description: US-395 north at CA-120 east. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching CA-120 East
item.description: US-395 North Approaching CA-120 East to Benton. CA-120 west joins US-395 north to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-395 North - Sierra Nevada Pass Information
item.description: Sierra Nevada mountain pass information on US-395 north. This sign shows the status of CA-120 (Tioga Pass), CA-108 (Sonora Pass), and CA-89 (Monitor Pass). At the time this picture was taken, the only pass still closed was Tioga Pass.

item.title: End CA-120 East at US-6
item.description: End CA-120 east at US-6. Use US-6 west for Bishop; US-6 east for Tonopah (Nevada).

item.title: US-6 West at CA-120 West
item.description: US-6 West at CA-120 West. Use CA-120 west for Lee Vining, Yosemite East Gate, and Yosemite National Park. Continue west on US-6 for Bishop.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching CA-120
item.description: US-6 west approaching CA-120 west to Lee Vining.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Jct. CA-120 West/Benton, Chalfant, and Jct. US-395/Bishop. This is the first distance marker on US-6 inside of California.

item.title: Distance Marker on US-395 South
item.description: Distance marker to CA-158 (North), CA-120 East, and Los Angeles, just south of CA-120 West

item.title: US-395 South CA-120 West
item.description: US-395 south at CA-120 west to Tioga Pass/Yosemite

item.title: US-395 South CA-158 Jct.
item.description: CA-158 junction (north) to June Lake
